title: ** Downtown DEAL ** Loft Studio 1 Bath Loft 2 Downtown
posting_body: ['Come and live in the center of Downtown Miami with beautiful city views.', 'This modern loft has an open-space concept with 10-foot ceilings, plenty of natural light, concrete floors, washer/dryer and Italian kitchen cabinets with stainless steel appliances.', 'This pet-friendly building is walking distance to Miami’s eclectic dining and entertainment scenes.', 'The building offers 24-hour front desk, 2 pools, and fitness center located on the 35th floor overlooking city views and Biscayne Bay.', 'Come enjoy Miami rich culture compromised of art, music, innovation, and fashion.', '651 sq ft', '1 Parking available ( $60/month )', 'Asking Rent :', '$2,450/month', 'You can either Text or Call :', 'Emmanuel CLODIC', 'show contact info', 'English/French/Spanish', 'London Foster Realty', '**NO REALTOR/BROKER CALLS**', '1060,1050, ICON, JADE, THE SAIL, 1010.', 'BOND.', 'HEIGHTS.', 'LUX.', 'BISCAYNE BEACH.', 'SLS.', 'CITY CENTRE.', 'VUE, THE CLUB, THE MARK, BRICKELL KEY, ONE MIAMI, ONE BROADWAY, BRICKELL FIRST, LATITUDE, NEO VERTIKA, AXIS, 500, BRICKELL ON THE RIVER, MINT.', 'IVY.', 'WIND.', 'CENTRE 1010.THE EMERALD, SKYLINE, INFINITY, THE PLAZA, SOLARIS, THE LOFT DOWNTOWN, 4 MIDTOWN, MIDRISE, MIDTOWN 2, EPIC, VIZCAYNE, EVERGLADES ON THE BAY, 50 BISCAYNE, MARINA BLUE, 900 BISCAYNE, 888, TEN MUSEUM, BISCAYNE BLVD, MIDTOWN, DOWNTOWN, BRICKELL, MIAMI, 33130, 33131, 33132, 33129.']
